LightningComponentBundle.description: This is a simple component to support with the collection of an esignature within salesforce, the signature is stored as a content document linked to provided recordId

property.name: isReadOnly
property.label: Is Read Only
property.description: Set this to true if the signature has already been returned and you just want to output the signature for view

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Use this to enforce that a signature is provided prior to navigation to the next screen

property.name: signatureFileName
property.label: Signature File Name
property.description: The file name to use when saving the signature image

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: The Id of the record to which this signature is related. This is used to save the signature to the correct record.

property.name: signatureRecordId
property.label: Saved Signature Id
property.description: This is the content version id saved during the process
